name: Advance Tech Jacket
description: Stay safe and visible in dangerous environments with the Lit- Armor High-Visibility FR Vest. This lightweight, flexible vest features FR active lighting technology, with integrated FR Lightning piping that is visible from up to 3 kilometers away. The LED lights can be turned on and off with a power button and have three different light modes to choose from. The vest is also lined with Meta Aramid lining, providing excellent heat and flame resistance. Its soft texture and flexibility make it ideal for use in low-lit or hot temperatures. The Ardor Advance Tech jacket offers augmented Heat Sensing technology with a stylish look of a high-performance softshell jacket. This multi-feature, DWR Softshell jacket is made using a durable softshell textile outer with attached quilting to give warmth and protect the wearer in cold working conditions. The integrated smart heating solution has programmable module which can be autoregulated with temperature control sensors. The Jacket has ample storage space through its spacious front pockets providing wearers with a practical selection. The Hi-Vis Illuminer Tech Jacket is a high-performance workwear jacket that provides comfort, ease of movement, and high visibility in low-light conditions. The jacket is made of industrial launderable stretch material and features Smart Led Visibility technology, a programmable module that provides high visibility through smart Textile fabric lightening patches attached to the back and sleeves, which can be controlled through 3 modes for static, motion, and fall detection. The jacket is also Bluetooth-enabled, allowing supervisors to locate workers in case of an emergency.

name: ARDOR ADVANCE TECH JACKET
description: The Ardor Advance Tech jacket offers augmented Heat Sensing technology with a stylish look of a high-performance softshell jacket. This multi-feature, DWR Softshell jacket is made using a durable softshell textile outer with attached quilting to give warmth and protect the wearer in cold working conditions. The integrated smart heating solution has programmable module which can be autoregulated with temperature control sensors. The Jacket has ample storage space through its spacious front pockets providing wearers with a practical selection. The Hi-Vis Illuminer Tech Jacket is a high-performance workwear jacket that provides comfort, ease of movement, and high visibility in low-light conditions. The jacket is made of industrial launderable stretch material and features Smart Led Visibility technology, a programmable module that provides high visibility through smart Textile fabric lightening patches attached to the back and sleeves, which can be controlled through 3 modes for static, motion, and fall detection. The jacket is also Bluetooth-enabled, allowing supervisors to locate workers in case of an emergency. Our Luna Hi-Vis Fleece Jacket is specifically designed to provide female workers with both snug fit and comfort. It is the perfect solution to ensure the wearer remains visible, warm, and comfortable in low visibility and cold temperatures. It features a contrasting hi-vis and navy design, back mesh vents to provide breathability, reflective tape for visibility, two secure side pockets, and a front zipper opening. This must-have Hi-vis fleece jacket gives you the protection you need while looking stylish. The Hi-Vis Poly Mesh Break-Away Vest is designed to increase worker safety and visibility in low-light conditions. Made of DWR fabric with silver reflective tapes and front pockets, this ultra-lightweight vest can be easily worn over basic workwear.

name: BRISKLY RIDER JACKET
description: The Briskly Rider Jacket is specifically designed to keep riders safe and protected while on the road. Its Kevlar shell provides exceptional protection for the elbows and shoulders and is reinforced with CE approved padding to prevent injuries in case of a fall. The jacket’s Kevlar shell also acts as a protective barrier between the rider’s skin and the road surface in case of an accident where the rider or pillion passenger falls from the motorcycle and slides along the road. For added comfort and protection, the jacket features a knitted 100% Meta-Aramid lining that offers excellent thermal stability, flame resistance, electrical insulation, chemical stability, and radiation resistance. Our workwear cargo pants are made from recycled polyester and cotton, making them both sustainable and durable. They are also designed with large side pockets for convenience and a knee 4-way stretch patch for unrestricted movement. These pants are perfect for working in outdoor, sunny work environments, and will help you perform your best. Our Nami Hybrid Fleece and Quilting Women’s Jacket features a range of versatile features and a sleek design, this jacket is the perfect choice for females in services industries to stay comfortable and warm while working. Constructed from durable ripstop polyester, it can withstand wind and tears, while the dirt-repellent woven surface ensures a professional appearance. The overlapping quilted pocket at the back and breathable materials make it effortless to tackle rain, mud, and dirt without feeling weighed down or uncomfortable.

Its Kevlar shell provides exceptional protection for the elbows and shoulders and is reinforced with CE approved padding to prevent injuries in case of a fall. The jacket’s Kevlar shell also acts as a protective barrier between the rider’s skin and the road surface in case of an accident where the rider or pillion passenger falls from the motorcycle and slides along the road. For added comfort and protection, the jacket features a knitted 100% Meta-Aramid lining that offers excellent thermal stability, flame resistance, electrical insulation, chemical stability, and radiation resistance. Our workwear cargo pants are made from recycled polyester and cotton, making them both sustainable and durable. They are also designed with large side pockets for convenience and a knee 4-way stretch patch for unrestricted movement. These pants are perfect for working in outdoor, sunny work environments, and will help you perform your best. Constructed from durable ripstop polyester, it can withstand wind and tears, while the dirt-repellent woven surface ensures a professional appearance. The overlapping quilted pocket at the back and breathable materials make it effortless to tackle rain, mud, and dirt without feeling weighed down or uncomfortable.

This jacket is not only warm and stylish but also offers a distinctive look for those who want to stand out.
